channel.title: Points over time
channel.description: I was wondering how can i make it give points for time for example say i want it to give the the player 10 pkps every one hour and also if they are idle for like 5 minutes they get logged out

item.title: Points over time
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Packet 202 is automatic logging out when your player is inactive… Adding PKP would be done with a calendar and the player’s character file.

Read full topic
